name: Desert Shooting Battle
description:
Into the heart of enemy territory, you need to become shooter to take down the rivals by your tactical shooting tricks. You are the only survivor commando during the world war of furious tanks in the royale city to eradicate the ruthless terrorist enemies. You are the last shooting man of all the civilians to defend the city for their survival. Move further in slow motion to counter gangsters & terrorists to cover yourself in order to get victory by amazing bullet fire.

Highlights!
_ REALISTIC 3D designs and fascinating livelinesss
_ Lot of Thrilling Missions
_ ADDICTING amusement play (FPS)
_ EASY and Smooth controls
